name: Sponge Date
description:
Hi there! Have you ever wanted to date a bootleg Mario brother? Well, now you can! Because I sat down and made this, so you didn't have to. Enjoy!

THIS IS A FANGAME. SOME OF THE CHARACTERS FEATURED BELONG TO VINNY OF VINESAUCE. THE EVENTS IN THE GAME ARE ENTIRELY FICTIONAL AND ANYONE FEATURED SHOULD NOT BE HELD ACCOUNTABLE FOR THEIR IN-GAME ACTIONS.
